data.message: I'm one user of Facebook and i'm lost my account by your team, cause i'm send so many friend request, i don't understand the notice cause i'm Vietnamese and your theme not support my language. I find my english teacher and write a letter to you. She's user of facebook to and tell me why i'm blocked. Now i know the reason and i want to re-active my account cause it's have so many friend,photo and note, it's my memories. HELP ME PLZZZ. Pls re-active account https://www.facebook.com/QuyenPhuongMelody Thanksyou so much much much !!!
